awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 14 nominations.

fullplot: The sea underworld is shaken up when the son of the shark mob boss is found dead and a young fish named Oscar is found at the scene. Being a bottom feeder, Oscar takes advantage of the situation and makes himself look like he killed the finned mobster. Oscar soon comes to realize that his claim may have serious consequences.
plot: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidently killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother both decide to use the incident to their own advantage.
title: Shark Tale

tomatoes.consensus: Derivative and full of pop culture in-jokes.
